project.name: SF DBI Data Pipeline Implementation
project.description: Implement Cloudflare Pipelines architecture for SF Department of Building Inspection data to enable real-time ingestion, historical analytics, and enhanced AI agent capabilities for the Renovation Project Manager system.

milestones.name: Phase 1: Pipeline Foundation
milestones.description: Establish core pipeline infrastructure, R2 buckets, and basic data ingestion workflows.

tasks.name: Create R2 Buckets for Permit Data Storage
tasks.description: Set up dedicated R2 buckets for different types of SF DBI data: permits, events, inspector analytics, and processed files tracking.

tasks.name: Create Core Permit Data Pipeline
tasks.description: Set up the primary pipeline for ingesting building permit records from DataSF APIs with optimized batching and compression settings.

tasks.name: Create Permit Events Pipeline
tasks.description: Set up secondary pipeline for real-time permit status changes, inspector assignments, and permit lifecycle events.

tasks.name: Create Inspector Analytics Pipeline
tasks.description: Set up pipeline for tracking inspector performance metrics, workload distribution, and processing patterns.

tasks.name: Enhance Existing Permit Sync Worker
tasks.description: Modify the current permit sync worker to publish data to pipelines instead of directly writing to D1, maintaining backward compatibility.

tasks.name: Implement Data Schema Standardization
tasks.description: Define and implement standardized data schemas for permit records, events, and inspector analytics to ensure consistency across pipelines.

tasks.name: Verify Data Flow and R2 Storage
tasks.description: Test end-to-end data flow from DataSF APIs through pipelines to R2 storage, ensuring data integrity and proper partitioning.

milestones.name: Phase 2: Data Processing Layer
milestones.description: Implement data processing workers, update D1 schema, and establish data quality monitoring.

tasks.name: Implement Data Processor Worker
tasks.description: Create worker to process data from R2 buckets and update D1 database, bridging the pipeline data lake with operational queries.

tasks.name: Update D1 Database Schema
tasks.description: Enhance D1 schema to support pipeline integration while maintaining backward compatibility with existing agents.

tasks.name: Implement Data Quality Monitoring
tasks.description: Create monitoring and alerting system for data quality issues, pipeline failures, and processing delays.

tasks.name: Maintain Backward Compatibility
tasks.description: Ensure existing agents and API endpoints continue to function correctly during pipeline integration.

tasks.name: Optimize D1 Query Performance
tasks.description: Optimize D1 database queries and indexes to handle increased data volume and maintain fast response times.

tasks.name: Implement Error Recovery and Retry Logic
tasks.description: Build robust error handling and recovery mechanisms for all pipeline components.

milestones.name: Phase 3: Agent Enhancement
milestones.description: Enhance existing AI agents with pipeline data access and implement new analytics capabilities.

tasks.name: Enhance Permit Intelligence Agent with R2 Data Access
tasks.description: Upgrade the Permit Intelligence Agent to leverage historical data from R2 for improved predictions and insights.

tasks.name: Implement Historical Analytics Capabilities
tasks.description: Create comprehensive analytics functions for querying and analyzing historical permit data.

tasks.name: Implement Predictive Timeline Models
tasks.description: Develop machine learning models for predicting permit processing timelines based on historical data.

tasks.name: Create Enhanced Permit Insights API
tasks.description: Build new API endpoints that expose enhanced permit insights and analytics to the frontend and other agents.

tasks.name: Update Program Manager Agent
tasks.description: Enhance the Program Manager Agent to leverage permit processing insights for better project timeline management.

tasks.name: Enhance Contract Analysis Agent
tasks.description: Update Contract Analysis Agent to correlate contractor performance with permit compliance and success rates.

milestones.name: Phase 4: Advanced Analytics & UI
milestones.description: Implement advanced analytics features, real-time dashboards, and machine learning capabilities.

tasks.name: Create Real-time Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Build comprehensive dashboard showing permit processing metrics, trends, and insights in real-time.

tasks.name: Implement Machine Learning Capabilities
tasks.description: Develop advanced ML models for permit outcome prediction, anomaly detection, and optimization recommendations.

tasks.name: Add Advanced Query Interface
tasks.description: Create interface for complex analytics queries and custom reports on permit data.

tasks.name: Implement Notification and Alerting System
tasks.description: Create intelligent notification system for permit updates, delays, and opportunities.

tasks.name: Performance Optimization and Scaling
tasks.description: Optimize system performance for large-scale data processing and high user concurrency.

tasks.name: Comprehensive Testing and Documentation
tasks.description: Complete end-to-end testing and create comprehensive documentation for the pipeline system.

planner.name: Project Manager Agent
planner.role: Coordinates pipeline implementation, tracks dependencies, and manages timeline

frontend.name: Frontend Development Agent
frontend.role: Implements dashboard UI, analytics visualizations, and user interfaces

backend.name: Backend Development Agent
backend.role: Implements pipelines, workers, database schema, and API endpoints
